message.entry: The number of elements in the SmoothingFilterCoefficients property must be odd and must be at least 3.
Expected NeighborhoodSize to be a vector of two real valued odd integers.
At least one of CornerLocationOutputPort and MetricMatrixOutputPort properties must be set to true.
Input cannot be logical when Method is set to ''Local intensity comparison (Rosten & Drummond)''.
Input image must be a matrix of size at least {0}-by-{1}.
